name: Movie Detectives and Mysteries Quiz | Movies | 10 Questions

questions.text: Paul Newman played a private eye in 'Harper'. Who played his ex-wife?
questions.explanation:
Janet Leigh.

	All 4 were in the movie

questions.text: Lana Turner played a woman who conspired to murder her husband in 'The Postman Always Rings Twice'. She played the same type of character in:
questions.explanation:
Portrait in Black.

	Anthony Quinn was the co-star

questions.text: Walter Matthau is best known as a comedy actor, but he has played other roles. One such role as a tough guy involved in a heist was
questions.explanation:
Charley Varrick.

	He was convincing, too

questions.text: Everyone knows that Bogart starred in 'The Big Sleep', but who played the cop bent on revenge in 'The Big Heat'?
Gene Hackman played a tough cop in 'The French Connection'. His character was based somewhat on the real-life adventures of this cop:
'The 39 Steps' is one of Hitchcock's less-frequently shown movies. There have been a few versions; who played the lead in one of them?
questions.explanation:
Robert Donat.

	There are three versions

questions.text: 'A Touch of Evil' was an Orson Welles project, featuring Welles as a slightly odd detective. Who was the other male lead?
questions.explanation:
Charlton Heston.

	Why is this movie so well regarded?

questions.text: Another movie that was based on the true life experiences of a cop was 'Serpico'. Who played him in the movie of the same name?
'The Spiral Staircase' doesn't have a cop or detective, but it's still a tidy little thriller. Who starred as the woman-in-danger?
questions.explanation:
Dorothy McGuire.

	It's held up reasonably well
